basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was implemented by the Chickasaw Nation along with Alexander Michelthwate to support students who are members of one of the 39 tribes in Oklahoma, with a preference to the Chickasaw Nation. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate or Graduate student Must be enrolled full-time Must be actively involved in musical activities at UCO Registered member of one of the 39 tribes in Oklahoma Preference will be given to members of the Chickasaw Nation This scholarship will be available to apply for during the current UCO student application period.
